benefits.title: Benefits of Creating an Account
benefits.accessFromAnyDevice: Access your data from any device

bloodPressure.title: Blood Pressure Monitor
bloodPressure.description: Track your blood pressure readings, monitor trends, and get insights into your cardiovascular health with advanced analytics.
bloodPressure.notesPlaceholder: Do you have any changes in your lifestyle today you want to share?

categories.normalDesc: Your blood pressure is in the normal range. Keep up the good work!
categories.elevatedDesc: Your systolic pressure is elevated. Consider lifestyle changes.
categories.highStage1Desc: You have stage 1 high blood pressure. Consult your doctor.
categories.highStage2Desc: You have stage 2 high blood pressure. See your doctor promptly.
categories.hypertensiveCrisisDesc: This is a medical emergency. Seek immediate medical attention!

bloodSugar.title: Blood Sugar Monitor
bloodSugar.description: Monitor your glucose levels, track patterns, and manage diabetes with comprehensive logging and analysis tools.
bloodSugar.mealInfoPlaceholder: e.g., Breakfast with oatmeal and fruit
bloodSugar.notesPlaceholder: Any additional notes about this reading...

categories.normalDesc: Your blood sugar levels are within the normal range. Keep up the good work!
categories.preDiabetesDesc: Your blood sugar is elevated. Consider lifestyle changes and consult your doctor.
categories.diabetesDesc: Your blood sugar indicates diabetes. Please consult with your healthcare provider.
categories.criticalDesc: This is a critical level. Seek immediate medical attention!
categories.lowBloodSugarDesc: Your blood sugar is dangerously low. Consume glucose immediately and seek medical help if symptoms persist.

dateTime.invalidDateTime: Please enter a valid date and time (not in the future and not more than 5 years ago)

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.addMoreReadings: Add at least 2 readings to see trend analysis

import.title: Import Data
import.clickToUpload: Click to upload CSV file or drag and drop

home.title: Take Control of Your Health Journey
home.subtitle: Monitor your vital health metrics with precision. Get personalized insights, track trends, and make informed decisions about your wellbeing.

smartAnalytics.title: Smart Analytics
smartAnalytics.description: Advanced insights and trend analysis for better health decisions

visualReports.title: Visual Reports
visualReports.description: Beautiful charts and graphs to track your progress over time

historicalData.title: Historical Data
historicalData.description: Log past readings and maintain comprehensive health records

securePrivate.title: Secure & Private
securePrivate.description: Your health data stays on your device, completely private

bloodPressureTracker.title: Blood Pressure Monitor
bloodPressureTracker.description: Track your blood pressure readings, monitor trends, and get insights into your cardiovascular health with advanced analytics.

bloodSugarTracker.title: Blood Sugar Monitor
bloodSugarTracker.description: Monitor your glucose levels, track patterns, and manage diabetes with comprehensive logging and analysis tools.

home.whyChooseDesc: Built with cutting-edge technology and designed by healthcare professionals to give you the most accurate and actionable health insights.
home.trustedByDesc: See what our users and medical experts are saying
home.readyToTransformDesc: Join thousands of users who have taken control of their health journey. Start tracking today and see the difference comprehensive monitoring can make.
